newsitem.title: FRANCE: RPR gets Euro marketing OK for Granocyte.
newsitem.headline: RPR gets Euro marketing OK for Granocyte.

text.p: Rhone-Poulenc Rorer said it had received European Commission marketing authorisation for Granocyte for use in peripheral blood progenitor cell (PBC) mobilisation for autologous transplantation.
This process is a medical procedure performed on cancer patients to avoid a bone marrow transplant and enables a physician to administer high doses of chemotherapy.
Rhone-Poulenc Rorer is majority-owned by Rhone-Poulenc.
